typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	src_container_name as string,
	src_file_name as string,
	sink_container_name as string,
	sink_file_name as string
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Movies
Movies derive(title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6)),
		year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()'))) ~> ColumnAddedAndCleaned
ColumnAddedAndCleaned sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SaveRefinedData
